1989, whilst working at\u00a0<a href=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/CERN\" data-cms-link=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/CERN\" data-cms-link-type=\"external\">CERN<\/a>\u00a0Tim Berners-Lee\u00a0proposed to create a global hypertext project, which later became known as the\u00a0World Wide Web. During 1991 to 1993 the <a href=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/World_Wide_Web\" data-cms-link=\"http:\/\/en.wikipedia.org\/wiki\/World_Wide_Web\" data-cms-link-type=\"external\">World Wide Web<\/a> was born. Text-only pages could be viewed using a simple line-mode browser. In 1993\u00a0Marc Andreessen\u00a0and\u00a0Eric Bina, created the\u00a0Mosaic browser. At the time there were multiple browsers, however the majority of them were Unix-based and naturally text heavy. There had been no integrated approach to graphic design elements such as images or sounds. The Mosaic browser broke this mould. The\u00a0W3C\u00a0was created in October 1994 to \"lead the World Wide Web to its full potential by developing common protocols that promote its evolution and ensure its interoperability.\"\u00a0<\/p>\n<p>This discouraged any onecompany from monopolizing a propriety browser and programming language, which could have altered the effect of the World Wide Web as a whole. The W3C continues to set standards, which can today be seen with JavaScript. In 1994 Andreessen formed Communications Corp. that later became known as\u00a0Netscape Communications, the Netscape 0.9 browser. Netscape created its own HTML tags without regard to the traditional standards process. For example, Netscape 1.1 included tags for changing background colours and formatting text with tables on web pages. Throughout 1996 to 1999 the\u00a0browser wars\u00a0began, as\u00a0Microsoft\u00a0and\u00a0Netscapefought for ultimate browser dominance. During this time there were many new technologies in the field, notably\u00a0Cascading Style Sheets,\u00a0JavaScript, and\u00a0Dynamic HTML. On the whole, the browser competition did lead to many positive creations and helped web design evolve at a rapid pace.<\/p>"},"expanded":true,"templateUnitId":"MUNIT-63686e11-6c44-4e78-895b-5aa1fd6b767e-MUNIT","id":"MUNIT-595fed6d-17b4-4778-a4ca-04918a08df91-MUNIT","inserted":true,"description":"","ghostContainer":false,"visibleFormGroups":["9b68effe-95e3-4c14-9582-82b370ee7f74"],"insideGhost":false,"children":[{"moduleId":"rz_selector_elements","name":"{\"de\":\"Selektor
